data.title: Singers like Amy Winehouse?
data.text:
Are there any?

There's nobody who sounds exactly like Amy. But there are a number of British vocalists who have a soulful or bluesy approach to their singing. Beverly Knight, Joss Stone, Adele. But my favourite British soul/blues singer out of the lot is soul diva Maggie Bell, who was doing it before any of that lot were even born, and arguably better.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=klYe_rZ_DoY&feature=related

0

I agree, no one out there like Amy. A few artists i would recommend though around her genre would be Norah Jones and if you like quirkyness, then Paloma Faith as well.

0

Naya Rivera's done pretty good covers of Valerie and Back to Black on Glee. Obviously Amy's are better, but Naya has an amazing voice.

0

I haven't seen much of Amy but I watched the youtube of her duet with Tony Bennett and my first thought was 'Billie Holiday'...........and that's a pretty high bar !

0

A little known artist over here, but getting a lot of attention down under is Kimbra, who I would put in a similar genre to Amy. Example here:
